name: FHS_PoSpace_IoT
description: **FHS_PoSpace_IoT** is a prototyping and evaluation framework that studies the next generation BFT (Byzantine fault-tolerant) protocols specific for blockchains, namely chained-BFT, or cBFT. By leveraging FHS_PoSpace_IoT, developers can prototype a brand new cBFT protocol in around 300 LoC and evaluate using rich benchmark facilities.
